name: Run_scripts on Add to quote
action: <* ExecuteScript(PS_ARO_RESS_PartSummary)*><* ExecuteScript(PS_ScriptOnAddtoQuote)*><*CTX( Container(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summery_Cont).LoadKeys(PartNumber).Load(select '<*Eval(Replace("<*VALUE(ARO_Sys_Grp_Part_Summary)*>",", ","' as PartNumber UNION SELECT '"))*>' as PartNumber ) )*>
